column4: t says "Setting up virtualbox-2.1 (2.1.0-41146_Ubuntu_hardy) ..." and it's been like that for ages.  How do i unstick it, and what will happen to the system if I do?

I'm having trouble installing an outside package, it appears to have frozen on configuration.  It says "Setting up virtualbox-2.1 (2.1.0-41146_Ubuntu_hardy) ..." and it's been like that for ages.  How do i unstick it, and what will happen to the system if I do?
are you implementing a non-stable release? afik 2.06 is the current version.. you may wanna report the bug so they can properly fix it for the release of the stable version
